transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ha Jatin ji Himanshu baat kar raha hu good morning.
Executive: Ha ji ji bataiye bataiye. Kara rahe ho scope process sir aaj?
Customer: Kishan Swami ki abhi aapne wahi hai.
Executive: Sir bylead wohi max utna hi compensate karne ke liye sir main jo aapko de raha hu 10% ka cashback 18000 ka jo cashback hoga usko bhi hum aapko bylead ke package mein hi convert kara denge sir. To usme bhi around 40 ke around aapka bylead woh bhi ho jayega to 50 aur 40 90 ke aas pass to aapko non-lexical bylead aa hi jayega sir. To kahi na kahi unke cashback ka to aisa utilization nahi ho to hum bylead mein hi convert karenge to waha pe aap use kar lena sir us bylead ko. To hum aapka jaise hi cashback generate hoga.
Customer: Se pehle aapse baat hui thi woh to keh rahe the ki 100 se 120 mein baat kar rahe hain.
Executive: Nahi nahi abhi main to kal sham mein bhi unse pucha ki aapne is tarah ka unhone bola ki nahi ek baar maine bola tha ki baat karunga sir se ye bola hai sir aisa koi confirm nahi kiya tha to maine sir se kal bhi confirm kar diya tha woh possibility nahi hai Jatin sir jo hai wohi fact hai sir aaj ke date mein na 6000 ka agar hum package lete hain na bylead ka to usme 10 bylead milta hai sir aur 11000 mein 50 bylead milta hai sorry 50 keh raha hu around 20 bylead milta hai to main aapko de raha hu sir 50 bylead jo ki abhi 20000 ka kimat hota hai aur sath mein aapko 18000 ka cashback deta hu usme bhi 40 bylead aayega to 90 ke aas pass non-lexical bylead aur woh aapke aa jayegi sir aur ek cheez benefit hai sir ye aapko karwa rahe ho to abhi kara hi lijiye 1 tarikh se hamara jo star supplier hai na aur leading supplier hai uski jo bylead ka jo jo hum allocate karte hain weekly theek hai woh usme 30% ka matlab cut down ho jayega to jo bylead aise bhi kam ho jani hai sir next month se jo hum 30 tarikh tak login karenge jo bhi star aur leader ki sale jo usme jo actual abhi chal raha hai bylead woh de payenge naya jo sale aayega 1 tarikh se usme hum provide nahi kar payenge bylead to just request ki aapko jo baki logo se hai na woh difference aapko 1 tarikh se hi dikh jayega ki unka jo aapka weekly bylead allocate hoga aur aapka hoga woh dono mein kafi difference hai aur aapko fark bhi padega 30 se 40% ka aapko drop down dikhega jo bhi nayi services lete hain naya star supplier aate hain 1 tarikh se sir.
Customer: Sir ek baar aap Kishan Pal ji se baat kar lijiye.
Executive: Wohi confirm karenge.
Customer: Kya keh rahe ho?
Executive: Aap ek baar chacha ji se baat kar lijiye Kishan Pal ji se woh confirm kar denge.
Customer: Woh woh kar denge to aap bol dijiye na aap aap to communicate kijiye unko ek baar Jatin sir.
Executive: Nahi actually aaj baat hui thi unse aaj baat hui hai unki subah.
Customer: Hmm hmm to woh keh rahe hain pata nahi Sushmita ji se ya Anshi ji se woh keh rahe hain hum check kar rahe hain abhi kal bhi unhone koi mail wagera likhi hogi.
Executive: Hmm ha to woh abhi unhone confirm kiya nahi hai kuch.
Customer: Hmm ha nahi nahi woh mujhse hi puchenge na maine bata diya hai ki nahi hai woh possibility woh.
Executive: Woh possibility nahi hai bata diya.
Customer: Sir aap unse puch lijiye actually main main abhi kaam kar raha hu.
Executive: Nahi yahi pe baithe hain aap usme kis se kis se main bolu kis kya baat kar sakte hain.
Customer: Nahi main keh raha hu Kishan Pal ji se baat kar lijiye phone pe woh confirm kar denge jaise bhi hua.
Executive: Kis se aapke chacha ji se?
Customer: Haan ji haan haan.
Executive: Achcha theek hai aap unko bata to dijiye ek baar.
Customer: Haan main bata deta hu woh koi baat nahi.
Executive: Ek baar bata to dijiye unko.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants confirmation on the buylead package.

- Previously discussed 100-120 buyleads, not 90.



Resolution:

- Executive offered 90 non-lexical buyleads.

- Executive explained the benefits of current offer.

- Executive mentioned upcoming changes to buylead allocation.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss with Kishan Pal.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, cashback, package
